page.title: 17GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: {WALK THE PLANK SOMEONE IS ON IT AND YOU HAVE TO RUN FROM ONE END OF THE PLAY GROUND TO THE OTHER END.BUT IF YOU GET TOUCHED YOU HAVE TO GET ON THE GROUND AND GET TICKLED.WHEN YOU HAVE HAD ENOUGH YOU HAVE TO SAY'JOIN THE CREW' {BULLDOG} SOMEONE IS ON IT AND YOU HAVE TO RUN DOWN THE FIELD.YOU HAVE TO GET SOMEONE ON THE GROUND AND YOU HAVE TO GET THE PERSON ON HIS BACK. THEN HE IS ON IT. {HIDE AND SEEK} YOU HAVE TO HID SOMEWHERE AND SOME ONE HAS TO COUNT TO A 100 AND NO LOOKING OR THEY WILL BE OUT.THEN THEY MUST FIND YOU. {SPLASH YOU GET SOME WATER IN YOUR MOUTH AND SPIT IT OUT.IF IT DOESN'T TOUCH ANYONE ELSE WHO IS PLAYING YOU ARE OUT.
